methodology: Open-text analysis from post-order, dropoff, bounce, and ratings surveys

major_gaps.action: Add explicit kids portions or mild versions to existing dishes

major_gaps.evidence: Frequently requested cuisine with supply gap
major_gaps.action: Recruit Chinese partner (P.F. Chang's, Ping Pong, or local)
Ensure each cuisine has visible vegetarian option
Already available at limited partners - increase visibility

major_gaps.evidence: Strong latent demand despite existing supply
major_gaps.action: Quality gap - customers want more authentic options
No action needed - demand is met
No action needed - demand is met
Highlight Grain Bowls and Healthy partners

price_concerns.detail: Some customers want price under £25 or clearer pricing

portion_concerns.detail: Uncertainty about whether £25 feeds family adequately

delivery_concerns.detail: Confidence food will arrive hot and on time

insight_summary: Top unmet needs are: explicit kids options (74 mentions), Chinese cuisine (58), and vegetarian options (49). These represent the highest-impact recruitment targets.
